website_summaries.verdict: Buy the Pixel 2 for one of the best cameras on any Android phone and fast Google updates, but be aware that an upgrade is likely coming in a few months.
pros: Google's Pixel 2 has a superb camera with OIS and excellent low-light shooting
It's water-resistant and Google Lens calls up a trove of information to help you explore your surroundings
cons: The phone's battery doesn't keep pace with the Pixel's competitors and its Portrait Mode isn't as smooth on dual-camera phones
Its design feels dated and it doesn't have wireless charging or a headphone jack

customer_reviews.title: Best phone ever
customer_reviews.text: Best phone I have ever owned. Data transferred to this phone quickly. Set up was simple with easy instructions on phone. Camera takes great pictured. I highly recommend the Pixel 2 XL.
customer_reviews.author: contemplation

customer_reviews.title: A Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: This is a good-looking sturdy phone which operates smoothly and rapidly. What's not to love!
customer_reviews.author: Judith Martinez

customer_reviews.title: As promised
customer_reviews.text: Looks like new, too a bit to set up with my sim card and data transfer but up and working great.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick H.

customer_reviews.title: Camera stopped working.  Seller hasn't responded to me or Amazon's request for warranty info
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought this from Google to get their warranty support. Amazon reps reached out to them so that we could trouble shoot this phones camera error that prevents me from taking video, pictures, capturing QR codes and more. But this vendor won't even respond to Amazon. I got ripped off! There is no warranty.
customer_reviews.author: StudyGroup

customer_reviews.title: Terrible battery life
customer_reviews.text: The phones battery drops 1 percent every two minutes with no apps running (including none in the background) so will already need to have a new battery installed in it... I'm surprised the phone received such a good grade when it's clearly a grade c phone
customer_reviews.author: Jamie G.

customer_reviews.title: Defective Item Discovered During SETUP
customer_reviews.text: Like: The box was nice. It turned on and everything looked pretty. Dislike: The phone froze during setup ---- yes SETUP----and the picture turned to garbage and stayed that way!!! What. A. Piece. Of. Trash. Addendum: A few days after returning this phone I got another one at the Verizon store. So far so good as I type this review--- 5 stars. This review is for the initial one-- which was DEFECTIVE 😖
customer_reviews.author: Glenn D.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Great all around phone. Love it. Had it for a few months now.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Fingerprint sensor failed. Because of my concerns about all ...
customer_reviews.text: Fingerprint sensor failed. Because of my concerns about all of the issues with used devices, a Google employee (Dan) promised me a brand new device to replace my faulty Pixel 2XL. Google refused to honor his word and would only replace with a used refurbished. #badcustomerservice #googlesucks #googlelies #customerlost
customer_reviews.author: M. Hammers

customer_reviews.title: Regular monthly updated from Google directly! 3yrs Support!!
customer_reviews.text: U do get unlimited storage for the phone. In original quality BTW. Google photos will upload backup all vids and pics from the phone til 2021. Ish. Great phone 👍😀
customer_reviews.author: Poli554

customer_reviews.title: Great phone at great price!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my wife's Google Pixel 1 with the Pixel 2. Faster, thinner, and longer battery life. A great phone at a great price. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell L. Crawford

product_meta.title: Google Pixel 2 64GB - Clearly White, Factory Unlocked (64GB, VZW)
